page.title: 12Games in Ribchester
page.content: Tin Can Hoppit Someone counts to 50, --------------all the rest hide. When he has counted he looks for you. If you get caught one child can free people and the game goes on like that. Elastics You need a piece of elastic ------ and three people. Two people hold the elastic round their ankles and the other person jumps in and out. Skipping We play skipping. There are -------- all different rhymes. There is"I'm a little bumper car, number 72, And I went round the corner, I went down the hill, And I slammed on my brakes, But my brakes would not work,So I went to the garage, How many gallons did it lose?" You count to a number and when they miss they are out. There is also hopscotch skipping and a kind of running skipping and hopping skipping.
